content: <1>{{displayName}}</1> invites you to join the AI agent <1>{{agentName}}</1>.

comment.text: This key displays an invitation to a user, informing them that `<displayName>` is inviting them to join the AI agent `<agentName>`. It appears within the user creation flow, likely as part of a prompt or message presented to the invited user. Translators should ensure the invitation is clear and welcoming.
